page.title: 05Description - vantage point.
page.content: {View from Ferryside Cemetery.}I can see the headland quite clearly and the ruins of Llansteffan castle. To the right of the castle I could see three tall arches and a grey mansion with three white pillars. Then I saw a big deciduas and pine forest and some green fields with fresian cows in them. Bellow the fields was the coastal village of Llansteffan. Above Llansteffan a thin line of deciduas woodland going horizontaly and above that are some green fields with black sheep in them. Futher to the right I could see clearly a brown ploughed field and electricity wires. I could see the sgiji mud, the blue river and the marsh. I could see the sandbanks as well. I could see the long jeti, two chapels and bungalows.
